charges.charge_description: 18:1343 POSTAL, INTERSTATE WIRE, RADIO, ETC.; CONSPIRACY (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 4 years probation, six months to be served on home confinement; defendant is to pay cost of electronic monitoring system; RESTITUTION: $5,460.00 due immediately, execution of restitution is stayed provided defendant makes timely installments; Full payment of restitution is due 3 months prior to the expiration of supervision; SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $50.00 due immediately (RJA) (1)
